findings.rationale: The agreement states that obligations terminate after three years, which may cause uncertainty regarding ongoing confidentiality responsibilities post-term.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.risk_title: Potential Ambiguity in Confidential Information Scope
findings.rationale: The definition of Confidential Information is broad, which may lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential data.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information includes all proprietary information, trade secrets, business plans, financial data, and technical information disclosed by either party.

findings.rationale: The absence of defined penalties for breaches of confidentiality can lead to difficulties in enforcement and accountability.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of the other party's Confidential Information.
